author: Fox News
title: Biden to nominate Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to Supreme Court
description: President Biden is nominating Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, making good on a campaign promise to pick the first Black woman for the nation's highest court.
content: President Biden is nominating Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson to the Supreme Court, making good on a campaign promise to pick the first Black woman for the nation's highest court, sources tell Fox News.â€¦ [+2018 chars]
